description:
Q: True or False: The cover can make or break an ebook.

A: True!!

If only you could do your own covers ... Outsourcing is great, but you have to pay every time you need to change something in your title, or want to rethink a background colour ...

No more!

I created this course for those of us who want back control of this element of the ebook business - so we can create own covers until we make enough to hire expensive designers.

And get this: No Photoshop!

This course is for you if you are an author, or a digital product creator, and wish you had the chops to make your ebook covers yourself so that:

  • Complete creative and technical control over your cover
  • Ability to play around with ideas on your own
  • Save on expensive designer fees
  • Make changes yourself to your cover whenever you want

I will show you how to research the key elements of great looking covers, and how to find similar elements for your cover.

You will learn where to find free images and graphics that you might want to use in your cover, where to get the right fonts, and how to combine them together in pleasing ways.

Then, using just Powerpoint, I will walk you through assembling your cover, first in 2D, and then in 3D.

At the end of this course, you will be able to comfortably create good looking covers, quickly and easily, using Microsoft Powerpoint.

>>>> Enroll in this course now, and accelerate your self-publishing profits.<<<<
title: Create eBook Covers That Pop Using Powerpoint
